attributes.action: Petition for the introduction of education in the foundations of a civilised society for all citizens.
attributes.additional_details: This petition calls for parliament to debate the introduction of a national civil education programme explaining the basis of a civilised society, including education about how the justice system works and the ethical foundations of our justice system, education on the reasons why the death penalty has no place in acivilised society, education on the reasons why the views of the majority should not always hold sway in our democracy, etc. Education is the foundation for morality in a secular and civilised society.
